about.title: About Transport Consulting
about.subtitle: Two decades of engineering excellence and innovation
about.hero_description: Pioneering the future of transport engineering through innovation, expertise, and unwavering commitment to excellence.
about.company_intro: Transport Consulting has a proven 20-year record in providing highway, transport, planning and design services to clients in the private and public sectors, nationally and internationally.
about.experience_text: Our experience and knowledge have provided peace of mind to our clients in achieving their objectives with a quality output from start to completion.
about.mission_statement: Transport Consulting aims to provide expert industry technical and design documents to assist and support our clients' projects. Our company ethos strives to provide worldwide knowledge and experience to our clients with exceptional customer service and professionalism key to our success.
about.partnership_text: Transport Consulting works with you to ensure your project objective and vision come to fruition.
about.mission_text: To deliver cutting-edge transport and highway engineering solutions that enhance connectivity, promote sustainability, and improve quality of life for communities worldwide.
about.vision_text: To be the leading consultancy in transport engineering, recognized for innovation, technical excellence, and commitment to sustainable development.

values.innovation: Innovation in every project we undertake
values.collaboration: Collaborative approach with clients and stakeholders

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from satisfied clients who trust our expertise
testimonials.testimonial_1: Excellent and very professional service provided by Transport Consulting to support our Local Plan objection. Efficient data collection with robust analysis and clear presentation in a comprehensive technical report; all completed within a very tight timescale.
testimonials.testimonial_2: Our Grassroots football club have made an application to build a clubhouse to improve facilities. The project has some complicated objections around car parking and traffic management. As a club we had no experience or knowledge with regards to this and needed a consultant to work with. I approached Kevin and from the outset it felt like he understood our needs, talked us through the process, created a high quality piece of work and met all deadlines asked of him. We are grateful for all of the work and support given to us and wouldn't hesitate to recommend Transport Consulting for this kind of work.
